creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: view of harbor and village: light mountains at horizon; a few ships in harbor; shore curves inward into a peninsula at R with tall rocks and trees; dense village rooftops line the shore at R and center; rolling rocks or hills highlighted in light brow in foreground with dark foliage
markings: top R dowel when rolled, Japanese inscription; LLC: square intaglio: [ 吉田博印 ] {Yoshida Hiroshi}
title: Harbor View
